original_title: 2084: Video clip pour une réflexion syndicale et pour le plaisir
overview: Filmed on the 100th anniversary of the labour union laws in France, the quasi-science fiction film is set in 2084. A robot moderator helps us look 'back' at the contemporary labour situation and different directions the movement could take.
title: 2084: Video Clip for the Trade Unions' Reflection and Pleasure
